Translations.Text: Ara bastabika'i amara akase durga tairi karechi, ara ta susobhita karechi darsakadera jan'ya.
Ara amara take raksa kari pratyeka bitarita sayatanera theke
se byatita ye lukiye sone, phale tara pascad'dhabana kare prakhara agnisikha.
Ara prthibi -- amara take prasarita karechi, ara tate sthapana karechi parbatamala, ara tate utpanna karechi hareka rakamera jinisa suparimitabhabe.
Ara tomadera jan'ya tate srsti karechi khadyabastu, ara tomara yadera jibikadata na'o tadera jan'ye'o.
Ara emana kono-kichu ne'i yara bhandara amadera kache naya, ara amara ta patha'i na nirdharita parimape chara.
Ara amara urbarata-sancaraka bayu patha'i, tarapara akasa theke amara pani patha'i, takhana tomadera ta pana karate di'i, ara tomara tara kosadhyaksa na'o
ara nihsandeha amara nije'i jibana dana kari o mrtyu ghata'i, ara amara'i hacchi uttaradhikari.
Ara amara niscaya'i jani tomadera madhyera agragamidera, ara amara abasya jani pascate-pare-thakadera.
Ara nihsandeha tomara prabhu -- tini taderake ekatre samabeta karabena. Tini niscaya'i paramajnani, sarbajnata.
Ara amara niscaya'i manusa srsti karechi a'oyajadayaka mati theke, kalo kada theke rupa diye.
Ara amara era age jina srsti karechi prakhara aguna diye.
Ara smarana kara! Tomara prabhu phiris‌tadera balalena -- ''nihsandeha ami manusa srsti karate yacchi a'oyajadayaka mati theke, -- kalo kada theke rupa diye.
Sutaram yakhana ami take suthama karaba ara tate amara ruh phukambo takhana tara prati tomara para sijadabanata haye.’’
Takhana phiris‌tara sijada karale, tadera saba'i sababeta-bhabe
ibalisa byatita, se sijadakaridera antarbhukta hate asbikara karala.
